title: tour: code sample is "undefined"
body:
Context: http://tour.golang.org/welcome/4

The code sample of this page is `undefined` instead of something sensible.

Using Chromium 44.0.2403.89 (64-bit) on Linux.

![2015-12-16-112245_771x249_scrot](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5132125/11838431/58ea4ed8-a3e7-11e5-8f33-c8a335a5d4d0.png)
